name: Space Rift - Demo
description:
This is a demo version of the game, includes 1 spaceship and 1 available level for passing.

The game is in development, so errors are possible. We are sorry! In case of an error - write in the comments!

Try to take the highest rank - S. Share screenshots with your achievements! We are very interested in the average speed of passage.

Control:  S - slowdown; L.Shift - speed up; A / D - roll left and right; ESC - pause menu; LMB - shoot (Not useful on demo);

If you like game you can support our project on:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/space-rift-pc-game/x/15523836#/

also follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/mightyfoxstudio

and add Space Rift to Steam wishlist!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001520/Space_Rift/

Main distinctive feature of Space Rift is that you don’t have to fight hordes of enemies. Instead game captivates you with mastering flight, air-maneuvers and overcoming obstacles. Every level of the game is unique, and we mean it! They won’t leave you bored!
